Module: run_preflag_qa¶

This module contains functionality to combine the different preflag plots.

Reference¶

preflag.preflag_plots.combine_preflag_plots(qa_preflag_dir, trigger_mode=False)[source]¶

Function to combine the plots generated by preflag

Args:
qa_dir (str): Directory of the qa trigger_mode (bool): For running this function as part of the automated dataQA
Returns
(int) 1 or -1 if it was successfull or if it aborted
